name: Do not piss him off !
description:
[Game Jam] Made in 24 hours with the theme "Stroll" With the disadvantage that no UI was allowed.

                                                      .  .  . .. . 

You're a butler and your job is to make sure, at all cost, that the grumpy old master is strolling without disruptions on his trail. Or he'll be angry at you..

                     Instructions :                     
  • Move with the keyboard and push or the annoying chikens or the master to keep him on the trail and avoid obstacles.
                     Credits :                     

Laura : Art     Yuna : Prog     Lucas : Prog

      .. . .  .
